entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the morning then changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm.
